Adds a status field to every document in: Adds a status field to every document in this space. The status can be used to track work stages such as TODO, In progress, In review, Done, Rejected, or Archived.
Adds an assignee field to every document: Adds an assignee field to every document. The assignee can be selected only from members of this space.
Adds a stakeholders field to every docum: Adds a stakeholders field to every document. Stakeholders are selected from space members and can include multiple people.
Shows the current lifecycle stage of the: Shows the current lifecycle stage of the document. Use this field to make progress transparent for everyone in the space.
The assignee is the space member respons: The assignee is the space member responsible for keeping this document up to date and driving work to completion.
Stakeholders are space members who are a: Stakeholders are space members who are affected by this document, contribute context, or should be notified about important changes.
